claims.description: Provides read-only analytics from Summit into partner surfaces
disclaimers: No write, delete, or impersonation actions are possible
Data remains in tenant region; partner caches must respect TTL

claims.description: Consumes event streams for monitoring, GRC, or telemetry without mutation
disclaimers: No ability to replay, mutate, or enqueue internal tasks
Topics scoped to evidence-only or telemetry-only payloads

claims.description: Allows rendering of partner UI extensions inside Summit via wasm sandbox
disclaimers: No local storage, custom runtimes, or unbounded network egress
Execution capped with kill switch and syscall allowlist

claims.description: Sidecar adapters ingest data with normalization and attestations
disclaimers: Adapters operate with read-only tokens and cannot touch core DB
Adapters must support scale-to-zero and revocation within 60s
